title: Exhibit Largest BlockChainEXPO(JP)
description: Only few JP companies recognize Cardano as main BLOCKCHAIN!  At present, it is difficult to adopt CARDANO into the real business world.
solution: We will exhibit at the B.C. EXPO, largest business events in JP, and introduce Cardano to Japanese Fortune 500 and public organizations.
experience: Cardano Youtuber (Posted daily for 2 years)/ SPO / DC Spark member / Official Ambassador / Lawyer /  Certified Accountant
